input.label: Credits
input.placeholder: Enter the number of credits (e.g. 10 or -10)

title: Projects
confirmDateMessage: Are you sure you want to update the due date?
deleteConfirmation: Do you really want to delete this project?

form.titlePlaceholder: Enter the name of your project
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Add a description for this project
form.filesPlaceholder: Click or drag to upload an SVG, PNG, JPG, or GIF file (max. 800x400px)

validation.minTitleCharacters: Title must be at least 2 characters.
validation.minDescriptionCharacters: Description must be at least 2 characters.
validation.files: Please upload at least one file.

tasks.emptyTasksDescription: Add a task to get started.

details.title: Project details
details.visibility: Toggle to make this project public or private

dialog.descriptionCompleteOrder: This order already has a review. Do you want to mark it as completed?
dialog.title: Leave a review
dialog.description: Tell us about your experience with this project!
dialog.label: Write a review
dialog.placeholder: What did you think of this project?

selectFile: Please select at least one file
dragMessage: Drag files here or click to upload files
dragAndDrop: Drag files here or click to upload

timers.noTimeEntries: There are no time entries yet
timers.startAdding: Start by adding a new time entry

member.title: No orders assigned to you yet.
member.description: Hang tight! Your assigned orders will appear here soon.

organization.title: No orders assigned to your organization yet.
organization.description: Hang tight! The orders assigned to your organization will appear here soon.

message.deleteMessageDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this message? This action cannot be undone.
message.messageSentError: The message could not be sent.
message.messageDeletedError: The message could not be deleted.

help.title: Need help?
help.spacebar: Hold Spacebar and click while dragging.
help.mouseWheel: Use the mouse wheel to zoom.

chat.title: Comments
chat.noChats: Leave your opinion, ask a question or just leave a thank you note. Click anywhere in the file to leave a comment.

files.download: Please download the file to view it

shareProjectDescription: When you publish a project publicly, anyone with the link can access all the information of this project, including interaction through the chat and viewing files, details, and tasks.
